header

Class EDFFileHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • header.EDFFileHeader

  • public class EDFFileHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    EDF file header, consists of EIAHeader and ESA header

      • EDFFileHeader

        public EDFFileHeader(java.io.RandomAccessFile raf,
                     java.io.File edfFile,
                     boolean istemplate)
        Constructs EDFFileHeader using RandomAccessFile, EDF file name and whether or not it is a template
        Parameters:
        raf - the file to be read
        edfFile - the host EDF file
        istemplate - true if this is a template

    • Method Detail

      • saveToDisk

        public void saveToDisk(java.io.RandomAccessFile raf,
                       java.io.File file,
                       int saveOption)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Saves both EIA and ESA header to disk. Assuming EIA, ESA header are not template and EIA header not existed before Used to save the EDFHeader, not including the signal data body.
        Parameters:
        raf - the Random AccessFile for saving data in tables
        file - the file to store the header. the file must conform to raf
        saveOption - save according to save_options provided
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - IOException
